title: When can we expect the classes to begin for the 2020-2024 batches at IITs, NITs and IIITs? Are they going to be conducted online? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello I think the classes will begin soon after admission procedures are over . I think that they will begin in Online mode as it is going on for other previous batches as it is the best feasible way to begin with without wasting more time . As currently offline classes aren’t feasible , since IITs , NITs etc etc have students from all over India , so it would be difficult for everyone to move from one place to another . Also following social distancing is almost impossible in classes and hostels , mess and everything will be mess then . So it is quite impossible currently , but can’t say for sure , when government takes another step towards this , as in the last phase , it was left to state govt to take the decisions for schools and colleges . Hope that currently in December hopefully or after Diwali , classes will begin in Online Mode . Rest let’s see. Thanks Do comment your views.
